short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save, organize, and share highlights and notes. Follow people to see their content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlight the web and share the gist. Save people time with bite-sized summaries and focus attention on what matters to you. 

Add social collaboration to websites and PDFs, keep your findings in a CMS, and share highlights to Kontxt and other popular social networks. FREE to use.

Save. Organize. Follow. Share. Discover.

---

Social Web Layer

FEATURES:
💥  Highlights - with privacy and share controls 
💥  Comments
💥  Tags
💥  @Mentions
💥  Deep-Links - to highlights and comments
💥  Smart Navigation - summary side-bar
💥  Polls

---

Web App - CMS & Social Network

FEATURES:
💥  Profiles
💥  Folders - with privacy and share controls
💥  Groups
💥  Feed - of highlights from people you follow
💥  Search - your content or what's publicly shared
---

Enhance live sites on the web, or use the web app to archive webpages and PDFs and then enhance them with all the collaborative features.

【Contact】
Email info@kontxt.io with any comments, questions, suggestions, bug reports, or feature requests.
